title: Create PRD (Product Requirements Document) for personal showcase website
description: Create a comprehensive PRD document that outlines the MVP features, technical requirements, and development roadmap for the personal showcase website. This will serve as the foundation for all development tasks.

title: Project initialization and Next.js setup
description: Initialize the Next.js project with TypeScript, set up the project structure, configure essential dependencies, and create the base layout. This includes setting up Tailwind CSS, creating the folder structure, and implementing basic routing.

title: Create responsive layout and navigation system
description: Design and implement a responsive layout with header, footer, and main content areas. Create a navigation system that works on both desktop and mobile devices. Implement the homepage with featured content sections and basic styling using Tailwind CSS.

title: Implement 3D maps visualization component
description: Complete implementation of the Bugis 3D Map with Three.js integration, Google Maps data, and proper object positioning

title: Create routes visualization feature
description: Implemented route visualization from Bugis to City Hall using Three.js. Created a dedicated BugisRouteViewer component that displays an interactive 3D route with waypoints, distance information, and estimated walking time. Added a new routes section to the 3D visualizations with a dedicated page for the Bugis to City Hall route.

title: Build 3D objects gallery
description: Create a gallery for showcasing various 3D models with interactive viewing capabilities. Implement controls for rotating, zooming, and exploring the models. Add information panels for each model and ensure optimal loading and performance.

title: Develop chess game with AI capabilities
description: Implement a fully functional chess game with AI opponent capabilities, including different difficulty levels, game controls, and responsive design.

title: Implement tic-tac-toe and sudoku games
description: Develop interactive tic-tac-toe and sudoku games with varying difficulty levels. For tic-tac-toe, include multiplayer capabilities. For sudoku, implement puzzle generation, validation, and difficulty settings. Create a unified interface for accessing both games.

title: Create forex calculator with real-time data
description: Develop a forex calculator that provides real-time currency conversion rates. Implement historical rate charts, popular currency pair shortcuts, and an intuitive interface. Integrate with financial APIs to fetch current exchange rates and historical data.

title: Implement financial news feed and sentiment prediction
description: Create a financial news feed that aggregates news from various sources, categorized by markets/regions. Implement search functionality and filtering options. Develop sentiment prediction visualizations with market sentiment indicators and historical trends. Integrate with news and financial APIs.

title: Testing, optimization, and deployment
description: Conduct comprehensive testing across devices and browsers. Implement performance optimizations for 3D content and data-heavy features. Set up deployment pipeline with Vercel for the Next.js application. Configure CI/CD using GitHub Actions and implement basic analytics.

title: Documentation and user guide
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the project including setup instructions, architecture overview, and feature guides. Develop a user guide for visitors explaining how to use the various interactive features. Document APIs, data sources, and third-party integrations.

title: Test and run the Halict Next.js application
description: Run the Next.js development server, verify the application loads correctly, and test basic functionality of the existing components.

title: Fix UI duplication issue in Bugis 3D Map page
description: The Bugis 3D Map page currently shows duplicated content (header, navigation, and map description). Need to identify and fix the cause of this duplication to ensure proper rendering.

title: Implement proper Three.js integration for Bugis 3D Map
description:
Replace the current iframe-based approach with a direct Three.js implementation in the Next.js application for the Bugis 3D Map. This will provide better performance, maintainability, and integration with the rest of the application. The implementation should include:
1. Proper Three.js scene setup with OrbitControls
2. 3D models of key Bugis landmarks
3. Interactive elements for exploring the map
4. Responsive design that works well on different devices
5. Optimized performance for smooth user experience

title: Enhance Bugis Map with Google Maps data
description: Use Google Maps API to get more precise location data for streets and buildings in the Bugis area. Add Fortune Center to the map. Improve the realism of the 3D visualization with accurate geographical data.

title: Fix Chess Game self-playing and move handling issues
description: Comprehensive fix for the chess game's self-playing issue and move handling problems to ensure proper game mechanics and player interaction.

title: Fix Bugis Map object positioning and UI layout
description: Fix the issue where all 3D objects in the Bugis map are loaded in one place and the landmark buttons are disoriented. Ensure proper positioning of landmarks and improve the UI layout.

title: Improve Bugis Map landmark positioning with accurate Google Maps data
description: Fix the issue where all landmarks appear in one place by implementing a better coordinate system with accurate Google Maps data. Remove the unused bugis.html file from public/3D_MAPS directory.

title: Resize Bugis Map buildings and streets using accurate Google Maps measurements
description: Fix the issue where buildings are still too close together and streets are too small by using accurate measurements from Google Maps. Implement proper scaling ratios for buildings and streets based on real-world dimensions.

title: Further enhance Bugis Map with proper ground size, road adjustments, and Guanyin Temple
description: Improve the Bugis map by adjusting the ground size to match the scale of buildings, fix road placements to align with buildings, and add the Guanyin Temple (Kwan Im Thong Hood Cho Temple) near Bugis Street.

title: Add detailed road network with traffic patterns to Bugis Map
description: Further enhance the Bugis map by adding a more comprehensive road network with traffic patterns, smaller connecting streets, and accurate road layouts based on detailed Google Maps data.

title: Fix BugisMapViewer GPS coordinate scaling
description: Fix the object positioning in the BugisMapViewer component by properly scaling GPS coordinates to scene coordinates. The issue was that the scale factor was too large, causing objects to be positioned incorrectly.

title: Implement Tic-Tac-Toe game
description:
Create a Tic-Tac-Toe game component with the following features:
1. 3x3 game board with interactive cells
2. Game logic for moves, win conditions, and draw detection
3. AI opponent with multiple difficulty levels
4. Game status tracking and display
5. Controls for resetting the game and changing difficulty

title: Implement Sudoku game
description:
Create a Sudoku game component with the following features:
1. 9x9 grid with 3x3 subgrids for the puzzle
2. Puzzle generation with multiple difficulty levels
3. Input validation and error highlighting
4. Hint system to help players
5. Game status tracking and completion detection
6. Controls for starting new games and selecting difficulty

title: Enhance UI/UX with modern interactive elements
description: Improve the website's user interface and experience by adding more icons, interactive elements, and modern themes while ensuring compatibility with the existing codebase.

title: Add icon library and implement icons throughout the UI
description: Integrate a modern icon library (like React Icons or Heroicons) and replace text-based buttons and indicators with appropriate icons to enhance visual appeal and usability.

title: Implement theme switching and enhanced color schemes
description: Create a theme switcher component and enhance the existing color schemes with more vibrant and modern palettes, ensuring proper contrast and accessibility.

title: Add interactive animations and transitions
description: Implement subtle animations and transitions for UI elements to create a more dynamic and engaging user experience, focusing on page transitions, hover effects, and interactive feedback.

title: Add Interactive Buttons with 3-Second Effects
description: Create and implement buttons with animated effects that last for 3 seconds, integrated with the existing theme system.

title: Create AnimatedButton Component
description: Implement a new AnimatedButton component with 3-second visual effects and theme integration.

title: Add Animated Buttons to Landing Page
description: Integrate the AnimatedButton component into the landing page with appropriate actions and styling.

title: Fix Missing Tailwind-Merge Dependency
description: Install missing tailwind-merge package and verify AnimatedButton component functionality.

title: Fix Client Component Event Handler Error
description: Convert page components to use client-side interactivity properly by adding 'use client' directive and restructuring component hierarchy.

title: Update Project Name
description: Update the project name across all files and configurations to ensure consistency.
